summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Forty-third Street, from Brooklyn Avenue to Fifteenth Avenue Northeast in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing and constructing walk, under Ordinance No. 13775, creating Local Improvement District No. 1258 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
